data.why:
A very fast ,easy and safe text session package for perl. session
    is safer than cookie,but slower extra store session in file .I have
    used cgi-session and apache-session ,though they are easy and strong
    ,but they like elephant ,very very slow ,can not satisfy me,so I
    write a new session package optimize for text store myself to solve
    it.And DigiSession was created. DiGiSession use all the fast ways to
    create session ,and still safe.
